content.rendered:
We can’t wait to welcome you to the Leo family! The University of La Verne’s undergraduate and graduate offerings complement any lifestyle; please learn more about what interests you by visiting the following links.

Undergraduate Programs

  • Undergraduate Admission
  • About the University
  • Financial Aid
  • General Education Requirements
  • Programs and Courses of Study
  • Transfer Credit and Policies

Graduate Programs

  • Graduate Admission
  • Tuition and Fees
  • Financial Aid
  • Locations

Online Programs

  • La Verne Online

Continuing Education

  • La Verne Extended Learning
  • Professional Development Courses

Academic Services and Resources

  • Academic Success Center
  • Career Services
  • Class Schedule
  • Course Catalog
  • Disabled Student Services
  • Graduate Academic Services
  • International Services and Study Abroad
  • La Verne Experience
  • Study Abroad Opportunities
  • Technology Services
  • Wilson Library

Wellness and Safety

  • Student Outreach and Support
  • Campus Safety
  • Counseling and Psychological Services
  • Health Services
  • Title IX Sexual Misconduct Resources

Life at La Verne

  • Office of Student Life
  • Office of Student Affairs
  • Athletics
  • Campus Store
  • Civic and Community Engagement
  • Commencement
  • Dining Services
  • Diversity and Inclusivity
  • Housing
  • Parking and Transportation
  • Religious and Spiritual Life
  • Virtual Campus Tour
